<:WTB:708489317357584415> Repair on my GBA Micro 20th Anniversary. 

Challenging repair, not something I'll be able to do myself. 

It Needs: 

Resolder of a volume button on the side
New screws, only have two
Back housing (front is fine)
Not sure about this, but I think the clip for the small cable from the display is not attached properly or broken.

I'll pay whatever it costs, just please dm me if you can do it. I know it's probably easier to buy one from someone, but it's not _mine_. I know, it's silly.

[L] SoCal, local preferred but will ship.
